mapper.update: update plane set start_drome = #{startDrome,jdbcType=CHAR}, arrive_drome = #{arriveDrome,jdbcType=CHAR}, company = #{company,jdbcType=CHAR}, airlineCode = #{airlinecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIME}, arrive_time = #{arriveTime,jdbcType=TIME}, mode = #{mode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, date = #{date,jdbcType=DATE}, number = #{number,jdbcType=INTEGER}, price = #{price,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, start_drome, arrive_drome, company, airlineCode, start_time, arrive_time, mode, date, number, price from plane where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, start_drome, arrive_drome, company, airlineCode, start_time, arrive_time, mode, date, number, price from plane
